TextLibrary.Text: Imperial Guard
State your business!
State your business!
State your business!
State your business!
I am an emissary from the Queen of Bartonia. I have a message for the Emperor.
I am an emissary from the Queen of Bartonia. I have a message for the Emperor.
I am an emissary from the Queen of Bartonia. I have a message for the Emperor.
I am an emissary from the Queen of Bartonia. I have a message for the Emperor.
A message, eh? Well , the Emperor does not meet with commoners. Leave at once.
A message, eh? Well , the Emperor does not meet with commoners. Leave at once.

A message, eh? Well , the Emperor does not meet with commoners. Leave at once.
Look, I am a personal emissary of the Queen. I was sent here to...
Look, I am a personal emissary of the Queen. I was sent here to...
Look, I am a personal emissary of the Queen. I was sent here to...
Look, I am a personal emissary of the Queen. I was sent here to...
I don't care why you were sent here.You'll end up rotting in a cell if you don't leave. Now...go!!!
